thread.title: Kissa ek kiss ka | Deccan Chronicle
thread.title_full: Kissa ek kiss ka | Deccan Chronicle

author: Deccan
title: Kissa ek kiss ka | Deccan Chronicle
text:
Deccan Chronicle | Natasha Coutinho | October 11, 2015, 22.52 pm Karan Kundra Karan Kundra, who will be seen playing a rockstar Rahul Sabharwal in &TV and Ekta Kapoor’s Yeh Kahan Aa Gaye Hum, will soon lock lips with the lead actress Saanvi Talwar on the show. “It was what the script required. I followed the director’s vision. I was asked to kiss my co-star Saanvi and that’s exactly what I did.”
Newcomer Saanvi doesn’t seem to be as cool about it as Karan though. This was the first time she was kissing on-screen. The young actress took as many as 12 takes to get the scene right. She says, “I was so nervous about the scene. First of all, I haven’t kissed on screen before and this wasn’t just a peck on the cheek but a kiss. I haven’t even told my parents about the scene; I don’t know how they would react. Karan and I are professionals so we had to do what we had to do.”
 Karan Kundra Yeh Kahan Aa Gaye Hum entertainment television Also Read Shah Rukh Khan says that AbRam is a better dancer than him Paul Walker's 'She's All That' to get a remake? As good 'Ash' it gets! Prakash Raj ‘thrown out’
